title: ManyChat + Make Automation Developer (WhatsApp, Instagram & Momence Integration)
job_overview:
We’re hiring a developer to adapt an existing WhatsApp + Instagram automation system, currently built with WATI + Make + GymMaster, and rebuild it using ManyChat + Make + Upgrade to see actual infonce.

This project covers 3 brand variants:

- Power & Revive Gym
- Revive Pilates (same logic, separate content)
- Fitness Trainer Academy (similar flow, different onboarding steps)

What you’ll do:

- Adapt automation flow inside Make

- Connect flows to 3 ManyChat accounts (WA + IG)

- Replace GymMaster logic with Upgrade to see actual infonce equivalents

- Link flows and triggers to booking/payment links or Upgrade to see actual infonce API

- Update content per brand (all provided)

You’ll receive:

- Full Upgrade to see actual info blueprint from current system

- Flowcharts, content, booking/payment links

- All platform logins and assets
